text.div:
Probability of developing breast cancer before the age indicated:

Age Probability (%)
current-53 0.0168
54-57 0.0368
58-62 0.0594
63-67 0.0838
68-72 0.1089
73-77 0.1327
78-82 0.1530
83-87 0.1663
